quotes.message: If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost. When health is lost, something is lost. When character is lost, all is lost.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I am grateful for the blessings of wealth, but it hasn't changed who I am. My feet are still on the ground. I'm just wearing better shoes.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: He is rich or poor according to what he is, not according to what he has.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas not money.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Wealth stays with us a little moment if at all. Only our characters are steadfast, not our gold.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: The way to wealth depends on just two words, industry and frugality.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: In every well-governed state wealth is a sacred thing. In democracies it is the only sacred thing.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Wealth is power, and power is the only thing about which contemporary culture cares.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: But wealth is a great means of refinement and it is a security for gentleness, since it removes disturbing anxieties.
quotes.name: Donald Grant Mitchell

quotes.message: Our wealth is often a snare to ourselves, and always a temptation to others.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Wealth is the Conjurer's Devil, Whom, when he thinks he hath, the Devil hath him.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Wealth is the smallest thing on earth, the least gift that God has bestowed on mankind.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: All wealth is the product of labor.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Seek not greater wealth, but simpler pleasure. Not higher fortune, but deeper felicity.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Wealth is nothing more or less than a tool to do things with. It is like the fuel that runs the furnace or the belt that runs the wheel only a means to an end.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: Wealth is the slave of a wise man. The master of a fool.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: Earth is dearer than gold.
quotes.name: Estonian

quotes.message: If you know how to spend less than you get, you have the philosopher's stone.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Save money and money will save you.
quotes.name: Jamaican

quotes.message: The devil dances in empty pockets.
quotes.name: Tudor

quotes.message: Wealth is both an enemy and a friend.
quotes.name: Nepalese

quotes.message: Wealth is but dung; useful only when spread.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Who is rich? He that enjoys his portion.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Worldly prosperity is like writing on water.
quotes.name: Telagu
